EnvironmentId.description: The ID of the environment to restart the server for.  Condition: You must specify either this or an EnvironmentName, or both. If you do not specify either, AWS Elastic Beanstalk returns MissingRequiredParameter error.

EnvironmentName.description: The name of the environment to restart the server for.  Condition: You must specify either this or an EnvironmentId, or both. If you do not specify either, AWS Elastic Beanstalk returns MissingRequiredParameter error.
